Formats input dates as YYYY-MM-DD

Shows confirmation dialog to user
If user confirms, vehicle will be deleted (if no error in deletion is present)
If user cancels, he/she will stay in the "Vehicles" view

description: Sends vehicle to be deleted to the Vehicles Service

description:
If vehicle edition is successful, shows user success feedback
If vehicle edition is unsuccessful, shows user error feedback

description: Sends vehicle to be edited to the Vehicles Service

description: gets current system User

description: Requests Vehicles Service a list of vehicles with filter parameters applied

description: Reloads current state. Used for clearing filter parameters applied

unknown.tagValue: {string} returns a String with the following format: MMM DD, YYYY

name: getVehicleTypes
description: Gets vehicle types from backend. E.g. Golf car, Mini-Van, Gas Car, etc.

content:
# RUM Vehicle - Web

A web application that handles all expenses related to UPRM's Vehicle fleet.

## Usage

First, install the package using npm:
```
npm install
```
Then, create a .env file for providing environment variables to build:
```
nano .env
```
define ASSET_PATH, PATH and PORT in .env and use it like so:
```
# Run application in dev mode
npm run dev

# Run application in prod mode (served by Express)
npm run prod
OR
npm run build && npm run server
```

## Distribution and Deployment
For distribution purposes, minified + gzipped web application with documentation
can be built using the following:
```
npm run build
```
Results can be found in /dist

## Documentation
Documentation can be generated using npm:
```
npm build:docs
```

## License

This library is licensed under MIT.
name: ./README.md

content:
{
  "private": true,
  "engines": {
    "node": "6.9.4"
  },
  "main": ".dist/app.bundle.js",
  "scripts": {
    "build": "npm run clean && npm run build:app && npm run build:docs",
    "build:app": "cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack --config=webpack.prod.js",
    "build:docs": "cross-env NODE_ENV=production esdoc",
    "clean": "rimraf ./dist ./docs",
    "dev": "cross-env NODE_ENV=development webpack-dev-server --hot --progress --config=webpack.dev.js",
    "server": "cross-env NODE_ENV=production node server.js",
    "test": "cross-env NODE_ENV=development karma start",
    "prod": "npm run build && npm run server"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "angular-mocks": "1.5.7",
    "babel-core": "^6.23.1",
    "babel-loader": "^7.1.2",
    "babel-plugin-angularjs-annotate": "^0.8.2",
    "babel-preset-env": "^1.6.1",
    "chai": "^4.1.2",
    "copy-webpack-plugin": "^4.3.1",
    "cross-env": "^5.1.3",
    "css-loader": "^0.26.2",
    "dotenv": "^4.0.0",
    "express": "^4.16.2",
    "extract-text-webpack-plugin": "^3.0.2",
    "file-loader": "^0.10.1",
    "html-loader": "^0.4.5",
    "html-webpack-plugin": "^2.28.0",
    "http-proxy": "^1.16.2",
    "json-loader": "^0.5.4",
    "karma": "^1.7.1",
    "karma-chai": "^0.1.0",
    "karma-chrome-launcher": "^2.2.0",
    "karma-mocha": "^1.3.0",
    "karma-mocha-reporter": "^2.2.5",
    "karma-sinon": "^1.0.5",
    "karma-sourcemap-loader": "^0.3.7",
    "karma-webpack": "^2.0.9",
    "mocha": "^4.0.1",
    "ng-annotate-loader": "^0.2.0",
    "node-sass": "^4.5.0",
    "resolve-url-loader": "^2.2.1",
    "rimraf": "^2.6.2",
    "sass-loader": "^6.0.2",
    "sinon": "^4.1.3",
    "style-loader": "^0.13.2",
    "url-loader": "^0.5.8",
    "webpack": "^3.10.0",
    "webpack-bundle-analyzer": "^2.2.1",
    "webpack-dev-middleware": "^2.0.4",
    "webpack-dev-server": "^2.4.1",
    "webpack-merge": "^4.1.1",
    "yargs": "^3.3.1"
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "angular": "1.5.7",
    "angular-animate": "1.5.7",
    "angular-bootstrap-lightbox": "0.12.0",
    "angular-chart.js": "~0.6.0",
    "angular-dragula": "1.2.7",
    "angular-file-upload": "^2.5.0",
    "angular-h-sweetalert": "^2.0.1",
    "angular-loading-bar": "0.9.0",
    "angular-material": "^1.1.5",
    "angular-material-calendar": "0.2.14",
    "angular-material-data-table": "^0.10.10",
    "angular-messages": "1.5.7",
    "angular-translate": "2.11.0",
    "angular-translate-loader-static-files": "2.11.0",
    "angular-translate-loader-url": "2.11.0",
    "angular-truncate-2": "^0.4.2",
    "angular-ui-router": "1.0.0-rc.1",
    "angular-ui-sortable": "0.14.3",
    "c3-angular": "1.2.0",
    "jquery": "3.1.0",
    "material-angular-paging": "git+https://github.com/Crawlink/material-angular-paging.git",
    "mdi": "^1.6.50",
    "moment": "^2.20.0",
    "moment-es6": "^1.0.0",
    "ng-material-floating-button": "0.6.2",
    "ngstorage": "^0.3.11",
    "perfect-scrollbar": "^0.6.12",
    "sweetalert2": "^6.11.5"
  },
  "esdoc": {
    "source": "./app",
    "destination": "./docs",
    "plugins": [
      {
        "name": "esdoc-standard-plugin"
      }
    ]
  }
}
